channel.title: James D'Amato on Strat

item.title: The Ultimate Micro-RPG Book - 40 Fast, Easy, And Fun Tabletop Games
item.description: A collection of small one shot tabletop RPGs. Their quality varies and not all of them will be interesting to the people you play with BUT there’s some bangers in here.
